org.sd.text
Class AbstractPatternFinder

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.AbstractPatternFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
PatternFinder
Direct Known Subclasses:
NumberFinder, TermFinder
public abstract class AbstractPatternFinder
extends java.lang.Object
implements PatternFinder

Abstract implementation of a pattern finder.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Specified by:
split in interface PatternFinder

split

public NormalizedString[] split(NormalizedString input,
                                int acceptPartial,
                                boolean keepMatch)
Split the input on the patterns, keeping only the data between.

If keepMatch, matches will be in odd indexes of the result; Note that result[evenIndexes] could be null if the first match was at the beginning or between different consecutive matches.
